StudyGPT is your personal AI study assistantя╝Б

StudyGPT helps
- explaining academic concepts, 
- answering academic questions,

- recommending references based on paper topics, and what your everyday use:

ЁЯПЖStudyGPT is a beloved personal study assistant (Chrome extension) among students. (You don't wanna miss it!)

ЁЯОЙ You can use StudyGPT on any webpage, which is more convenient than standalone sites like GPT-4 and Claude, and it's уАРcompletely freeуАС, without needing an OpenAI account.

ЁЯСЙ Main features:
тСа Answering general and academic questions
тСб Generating exercises based on learning materials
тСв Creating writing guides with recommended references based on paper topics
тСг Summarizing the contents of YouTube videos
тСд Performing a variety of text-related tasks such as rewriting, summarizing, correcting grammar, etc.
тСе Connect StudyGPT to the internet to always access the latest content online

ЁЯЪА Quick start tips:
тСа Press [Cmd+I] or [Ctrl+I] on any webpage to activate StudyGPT to assist your study and work.
тСб Select any text on any webpage, and let StudyGPT explain, translate, rewrite, summarize, etc.
тСв Use the [Exercise Generation] tool to let StudyGPT generate exercises based on learning materials.
тСг Use the [Writing Guide] feature to upload writing task documents and let StudyGPT create a writing guide with recommended reference articles.
тСд Use the [Chat Document] feature to upload documents and let StudyGPT answer questions based on their content.
тСе Go to a YouTube video page with subtitles, click the [Watch Video] button in the sidebar, and get the key content of the video.

ЁЯУз Any questions, suggestions, or feedback?
Email us at service@xbuddy.ai

FAQ:
1. What is GPT-4?
GPT-4 is a large language model developed by OpenAI. It's based on the GPT (Generative Pre-trained Transformer) architecture and has been trained on a vast amount of text data from the internet. GPT-4 can be used for various natural language processing tasks, such as language translation, text summarization, text generation, and answering questions. It can understand and respond to user input in a conversational manner, making it ideal for chatbot and virtual assistant applications.
2. Who created GPT-4?
GPT-4 was created by OpenAI, a company based in San Francisco. It was launched on November 30, 2022. OpenAI's CEO, Sam Altman, is also referred to as the founder of GPT-4.
3. How is StudyGPT different from GPT-4/Claude/NotionAI/Evernote/Bard/New Bing?
StudyGPT is an AI intelligent learning assistant tool developed based on the new generation of large language model technology. It has professional features such as answering academic questions, generating exercises, and providing writing guidance. GPT-4/Claude are software primarily designed for general conversation scenarios, NotionAI/Evernote is software mainly designed for general writing scenarios, Bard and New Bing are AI tools primarily designed for search scenarios. They can only run on their standalone webpages, while StudyGPT can be used on any webpage.
4. Is StudyGPT free?
Yes, this extension is free to use. StudyGPT provides 40 free queries to each free user every day.
5. GPT-4 is banned in my country. Can I use StudyGPT in my country?
Yes. The StudyGPT Chrome extension can be used in all countries. No VPN is required.
ЁЯТб Important Tips
1. After installing the plugin, please refresh the webpage to ensure its normal operation.
2. For security reasons, this extension is not applicable to Chrome store pages and blank pages.

Ang StudyGPT, ginagamit ang pinakabagong teknolohiya ng OpenAI, ay higit pa sa tradisyunal na mga tool sa pag-aaral at mga function ng ChatGPT. Hindi ito isang chatbot lamang; ito ay isang all-encompassing, libreng GPT tool na espesyal na dinisenyo para sa sektor ng academiko.
